DataElement.preferredName: Disease Response Most Recent Evaluation Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date disease response was evaluated, represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Response Domain Disease Response Most Recent Evaluation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to tumor response._The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression._Nearest to the present._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
